bibl.title: Songs for Sailors and Lovers.
The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - You or me? - Prayers for safety: Prayer form; - Prayers for safety; - Alcaeus fr. 129; - Sappho fr. 17; - Sappho fr. 5; - Sappho fr. 15; - The Charaxos Song; - The type and the performance. - Love songs: Sappho frs. 1, 2, and 31; - Sappho, fr. 16; - Sappho, Kypris Song; - Performance occasions. - Voices: Metrical style; - Linguistic style; - The voices of the Charaxos Song. - Summary and hypotheses.
bibl.seg: Joel Lidov, Songs for Sailors and Lovers.

Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 55-109.
